name: Supa Birdie Boi
description: Supa Birdie Boi - a simple, yet somewhat layered platformer game, packed with many short, action-packed levels. Pixel-art graphics and an old LCD-green shade both give off that nostalgic 90's feel, when much of gaming world was enclosed in a classic Game Boy.

name: Wisdom
description: Wisdom is a breakthrough in science education that explains the effects of psychedelics on the brain within the predictive coding neuroscience framework.

name: Gangster War
description: Help cool John avenge the betrayal, destroy the enemies and regain power over the city! Shoot the gangsters, shoot the gangsters, throw grenades into the crowd and drop bombs!

name: Don't Fall Asleep
description: A short, mini-shooter inspired by all-nighters and meant to be played in quick runs. Rapid gear progression and powerful consumable items are matched by swarms of ever-increasing enemies. No extra lives--falling asleep is game over.

name: Winter War 1939
description: Epic World War 2 battles. Finland vs the Soviet Union.

name: Super Can Cannon
description: Super Can Cannon is a 2D challenging timing action game with some puzzle elements and features a total of 60 levels across 5 different stages + 1 extra stage.

name: Humanless
description: Play as a super skilled combatant, with superhuman speed and agility. Fight against merciless demons, while dashing and jumping to dodge evil traps through carefully designed levels.

name: Cave Crawl
description: Cave crawl is an action-packed first-person melee adventure where you navigate your way through chambers of enemies to hopefully climb out alive. On the way you may find mysterious merchants who sell strange and curious items to aid you on your journey.

name: JumpCubox
description: JumpCubox is a physics-based 2.5D platformer. Roll and jump your cube through harsh traps in order to reach the goal.

name: Phantom Proxy
description: Cyberpunk rogue-like arena shooter with lock-on based combat. A computer virus threatens to destroy virtual afterlife.

name: Last Man
description: Become the Last Man on his quest to retrieve the Jade Monkey for Master. Just shoot everything that moves while sidescrolling to the right with up to 3 friends! Face endless waves of enemies that can traverse the map more or less like you do.

name: Lashek
description: Make up your mind to enter the Lashek family home and solve its mystery!

name: Last Ops
description: Reload your gun, turn on the flashlight and explore the darkest corners of an abandoned research station. Last Ops is a dark twin stick shooter with survival horror elements, framed in stylized low poly graphics. Upgrade your character, get new weapons, use different vehicles and uncover the mystery

name: Broken Veil
description: Broken Veil is a puzzle platformer with horror elements. Experience a post-soviet provincial Russian town through the eyes of a young boy and help him search through the faceless crowd for the most important person in a child's life – his mother.

name: Soulchild
description: Soulchild is a 2D storydriven platformer with metroidvania elements. Follow Silk in his journey to explore the surface world and find the masks, artifacts that enhance his abilities and will aid him to go back home!

name: Harpy Gaiden DX
description: Take flight in Harpy Gaiden DX, a cute platformer that lets you soar over foes as a variety of harpies all armed with their own unique style of combat. Fight your way through various creatures and rivals on your journey to catch the evil mannequin, Ashley!

name: No School No Rules
description: Immerse yourself in the full cycle of life of the most severe school in Russia! The game will tell you the story of a Russian schoolboy Ivan who is on the verge of graduation and expulsion. He intends to finish school in his own way and, along the way, take revenge on all teachers and local bullies.

name: Zooconomy
description: Zooconomy is a strategy-puzzle game where you exchange animals. Complete historic based story missions or play in sandbox. Get animals, breed them, attract visitors, sponsor expeditions for unique animals, upgrade zoo and much more.

name: Guardians of Lumen
description: Guardians of Lumen returns to the classic, turn-based combat that started the genre and mixes it with exploration, relationship building, and a reputation system to tie it all together. Can you survive the wastes?

name: Amamori Jinsei: Rain Leak Life
description: A simple VR action game where you endure long periods of leaking rain in a leaky quadrant! Put on the VR HMD and you're in a nostalgic Japanese four-and-a-half-mat apartment. If you leave the rain leaking, you'll get yelled at by the residents on the floor below!

name: Now There Be Goblins
description: Fight off hordes of goblins in this VR smack and smash tower defence hybrid! Punish the invading goblins by using your mighty chained hammer and your wide arsenal of traps and structures.

name: Haywire
description: Haywire is a randomly generated action/platformer game, set inside the world’s first fully automated department store. When the robotic staff suddenly go haywire, it’s up to you to stop the AI that powers them. Take control of a rogue ex-cop, armed with only your gun, your wit, and a few grenades.

name: Splitfire
description: Splitfire is inspired by classic twin-stick shooters like Geometry Wars, while pushing the genre to new territories. In Splitfire, both joysticks have their own weapon that can be aimed separately. This is why Splitfire is twin-stick shooter, redefined.

name: The Death Wizard's Tower
description: The Death Wizard has arisen from the dead. Ascend his tower, overcome the traps, defeat your enemies and conquer the Death Wizard. Learn magic spells, gain strength and collect rings as your fight your way through the 50 level Death Wizard's Tower to confront the Death Wizard in a final epic battle.

name: Animocity
description: Animocity is a hardcore top-down shooter game where we follow a bunch of magical animals down an ever changing set of dungeons as they use spells to fight their way out.

name: Super Dango
description: Super Dango is a dynamic-rule puzzle game, contains ture-base levels and real-time levels. Players should understand the rules and change the rules to pass the game. To achieve victory，you need imagination and over-fancy mind.

name: Labyrinth Hearts
description: Single-player GACHA game with side battle system. Upgrade your town and befriend/romance many of the characters you collect!

name: Essence of Time
description: Essence of Time is a story rich, hand-drawn RPG. Craft modular moves in a sphere grid as you build friendships, unravel mysteries, and explore timelines and their consequences during the final days of battle school. While students compete to be the next emperor, can you find a future without war?

name: Woden GP
description: Car racing in isometric perspective has travelled through time to the present, in a faithful recreation of 90s arcade machine style!

name: Oscillate
description: Start your racing career by enjoying the beauty of speeding, rushing & darting with your friends in versus mode or in a fun online multiplayer. You can also go solo if you want to. Are you ready to rush around the globe?

name: Shadows of the Sengoku
description: A grand strategy game that blends tactical turn-based combat into the mix set in the Sengoku period of Japan. Train and control units, execute missions, improve the land, and help your clan achieve their ultimate destiny: the Unification of Japan.

name: Hedrons
description: Hedrons is a fast-paced platformer game in a futuristic world full of menacing obstacles and enemies. Think quickly, discover the best path to your goal and collect all energy cubes before time expires.... And now: run!

name: The Wizard Game
description: An arcade style game with low poly art. You play as a wizard with a selection of six different abilities, and try to get a high score. The game also has a extremely mod friendly game engine, allowing you to change any game files, and create custom maps, model packs, enemies, game modes, etc.

name: Typing Hearts
description: Typing hearts is a brand new dating sim in which you combine your typing skills with your ability to chat with girls. It features a unique fast-paced typing game and an immersive operating system to showcase your story where every choice counts.

name: Letter Vetter
description: Settle into the idyllic village of Pipshire and protect the community from imposters. Use your brains as well as some intuition to find who doesn't fit...

name: Mystical Echoes
description: Be a special kind of hero. This 16 bit style Fantasy Rougelike Strategy RPG has a team of heroes defeat creatures that torment the minds of people whose minds are wired differently. Enjoy a Strategy RPG battle system that is intuitive, yet unique to the genre itself.

name: Ele-Mental
description: Ele-Mental is a top down fast paced arcade action absorb-em-up.Charge your Ele-Ments then rush your enemies.One of a kind gameplay, great for up to 4 players. Earn coins, unlock game modes and mods as you strive to become a true Ele-Mentalist.

name: Motorbike Racing Triple Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Open the Gates!
description: Become king of your own castle in this 2D side-scrolling RTS game. Construct powerful fortifications to keep the enemy at bay. Control your units and battle across five enchanted worlds.

name: Mushroom Picker Simulator
description: Mushroom Picker Simulator is a mushroom search and collection simulator that will involve you in hunting many different mushrooms growing in the wild. Collect mushrooms, enjoy walking in the forest, complete missions, improve your hut and your equipment.

name: Deadsigns
description: DeadSigns is a first person action game with survival and tower defense features. Go through many nights and beat a lot of monsters with style and get the best score ! This game is under active development and early access on Steam. Bugs, missing and unbalanced features are to expect !

name: Power of Slide
description: Gymkhana drifting game inspired by Ken Block's GYMKHANA video series. Drift, complete missions, earn points, unlock new cars and customizations.

name: Elisius
description: Break in your adventuring shoes with this story-driven, monster fighting, butt-kicking RPG! Battle fearsome beasts, level up, and discover cool characters, all while unlocking powerful magical abilities. Move up in the world, and become powerful enough to defeat the maniacal Time Lord.

name: YoyoMonkeyAdventure
description: “悠悠猴大冒险”是一款多人平台合作游戏。相互配合，不断移动，为了取得的圣雪莲前进！

name: Chonkymon
description: A bubbly, 2D-builder game where you breed animal Chonkymons. Build homes for your Chonkymons, design their interiors and feed them to make them happy. Put them in fusion tanks and combine them into new, unique critters.

name: The Creation of a Self
description: A love letter to 80s and 90s retro computing. A game that intersects poetry, programming, computers, love, death, freedom and living. Create a new self, program its memories, and destroy memory monsters created from those memories.

name: Your Dead Majesty
description: Conquer all towns under the rule of the Dark Lord by bribing your servants with gold. Spread the corruption and make the Dark Tower the center of the realm of… a fridge shelf, in this humorously twisted pixel-art strategy game. Corrupt the fridge shelf by shelf!

name: Roller Stars
description: Roller Stars is a 3D casual game where you need to manipulate the ball to destroy buildings and recycle materials.

name: CraftOut
description: CraftOut - a game that tells the story of the disaster of the future. You will be able to collect from dozens of details of an armored car of unique design, and go out into the open world, full of dangers and various riches. The game is in open testing.

name: Maxi Quiz du Foot Francais
description: Sin descripción

name: Dragon Extinction VR
description: Enter a fantasy world where humanity has brought dragons to the brink of extinction. This ARPG features hundreds of unique items, crafting and procedural dungeons.

name: Evil Icebox
description: 'Evil Icebox' is simply hard 3D Platformer Action Game. and it has simple operation sensitivity. You can attack the enemies, but can't kill them. It consists of 11 stages. Have Fun!

name: Gates of Mirnah
description: Gates of Mirnah is an upcoming story-driven sci-fi action adventure game. The energy-based combat system of Gates of Mirnah guarantees fun, action and variety.

name: VanillaBeast: Ace in the Hole
description: VanillaBeast: Ace in the Hole - a parody game. Hilarious pixel art action-adventure game that focuses on an open world environment as well as a massive variety in retro-style levels.

name: The Life of Frederick Sommer
description: The Life of Frederick Sommer is a short first-person mystery exploration game that takes place in flashbacks throughout your life.

name: The Last Warrior
description: You are trapped in a forest and need to escape before they find you, time is short and any misstep can cost you your life. Unravel the puzzles hidden within the dense forest of Gamesh, a place full of creatures that want the only thing YOUR HEAD.

name: Candy Fall
description: Candy Fall is a puzzle game where you must arrange the containers to catch the correct candy.

name: Pursuit of Redemption
description: Join the journey of S, a drawing boy searching for his creator and help him find his painter. Unfold the memories of your maker to uncover the mystery behind his vanishing, find your way out of a confusing maze, and ascend through the darkness in an emotional Hand-Drawn platformer puzzle adventure.

name: Planetation
description: On the harmstead you sow crops by day, plough hordes of alien pests by night, and spelunk the “Very Dark” depths whenever you damn well please. This bloodthirsty alien planet doesn’t want you here, but you’re a robot in a tractormech so what do you care?

name: Cheery Party
description: Cheery Party is a crazily fun multiplayer minigame based party game with huge replayability. Discover many original minigames, characters, worlds and game modes.

name: Operation: BoomSlang!
description: Don't trust your opponents, don't trust the wildlife... hell, don't even trust the walls.

name: Age of Legion
description: Age of Legions is a single-player strategy. The player must manage their territory and use its population and income to hire more troops and expand their influence.

name: Nightmare Simulator 2 Rebirth
description: You have lost your memories. You wake up in an unknown town... Try to survive and find the answers you seek on WHO YOU ARE!

name: Inside Explorer
description: This is Inside Explorer where you can digitally explore the inside of things. It is loaded with real-time rendered 3D visualizations based on unique scientific data.

name: The Warlin of Heroes
description: Heroes of The Warlin is a martial arts card game that combines Roguelike gameplay. Play with a variety of unique martial arts classes, and customize decks to fit your playstyle. Explore The Warlin, Experience the bloody winds of Junlough.

name: Saw Hell
description: Get ready for adventure playing as brave stump hero in this aggresive world

name: Urban Survival
description: Urban Survival is an open world Survival game, in a city setting. Survive the harsh elements of life on the streets. Find supplies for crafting make-shift weapons and shelters. Learn to cook using what you've got. Build a base of operations, grow your gang, and become a nomad king.

name: Aquacity
description: Dive into the sunken world. Face the dangers of the deepness. Build a colony and make it thrive. Conquer or explore the unknown, you decide which way you choose.

name: Loot Slider
description: Loot Slider is a tricky, but relaxing puzzle game, where you place and aim cannons on a grid in order to push treasure chests to their locations. The better solution you find on each level, the more stars you get. Can you collect all 168?

name: Pull
description: a low stress physics based game where you swing the moon around to hit targets.

name: Mir
description: You are lost, you are small, and the forest is ever-changing. Exchange favours with monsters in classic adventure fashion to escape the increasingly dark expanse, or succumb to the horrors that reside within.

name: EstradaBus HD
description: Inspired by tropical scenarios, EstradaBus brings simulation of buses and other passenger transport vehicles. Work transporting passengers, your luggage, upgrade your fleet and buy new garages for your company!

name: Buildmark
description: Buildmark is a sandbox with gameplay based around real time ray tracing tech capabilities plus there is a ray tracing benchmark to decide who is the boss.

name: The Deed of Deception
description: The Deed of Deception is a puzzle/deception game set in the roaring '20s. You and up to 4 of your friends have been called to the manor in order to win an inheritance from your deceased relative, only to find out he may not have been who you believed him to be.

name: Fallen World
description: Fallen World is an Survival-Horror Adventure Dinosaur game inspired by the original Jurassic Park film.

name: Mischance
description: Mischance is a game about surviving as long as possible with a curse that guarantees an imminent death. Everything in your day-to-day life is now much more likely to kill you. Your objective is to make smart choices and hope that the most simplest of activities don't end up taking your life.

name: Comic 5trike
description:
Save the world using superpowers while fighting hordes of enemies with your friends!

5 friends get themselves tangled in a fight against a crazy doctor, a girl that can control black holes, and hordes of robots hunting for the same beings that gave the kids their superpowers.

name: Band of Brothers
description: Band of Brothers is a fast-paced action shooter! Various maps, many types of weapons, different modes are waiting for you in which teams will come together in a battle for victory.

name: Boom Dojo
description: Boom Dojo is a procedural rhythm boxing trainer

name: Surviving Space
description: Survive in this open world space adventure. Get the highest scores and be better than everyone else!

name: Dark Maze
description: Difficult adventure game going through stages in a dark maze You have to finish the stage before the vehicle energy is over You can collect energy from the light Flashes

name: Birbout!
description: Birbout! (a.k.a Sunny The Cockatiel) is an arcade platform shooter where you play as Sunny The Cockatiel, unlock weapons, eat seeds, fight Plovers and save Snowy The Cockatiel from Desmond the Cat!

name: Eternal Cycle
description: "Eternal Cycle" is an AVG game with adventure and puzzle theme. The protagonist explores caves by various props. Throughout the exploration process, the protagonist escapes from different monsters to seek survival. As the exploration continue, the protagonist himself undergones some subtle changes.

name: A Guard Walks Into a Tavern
description: You will play as a guard, whose job is to post rewards about monsters and wait for the heroes to undertake the tasks. You will try to raise a family and deal with different affairs, and when various forces come to you for their ulterior purpose, you will have to make a choice!

name: Trickery&Strategy
description:
In the game players play the role of a vassal king who just succeeded to the throne in the spring and Autumn period.
Fully open the world, you can experience the life of princes and kings in it!

name: Gododo
description: Gododo is a casual game control by voice or touch, with hand-drawn comics, innovative gameplay, achievements, and extreme challenges.

name: Ships 2022
description: Ships 22 is a combination of an economic strategy and a ship control simulator. Manage and upgrade your port, recruit a crew, carry out your mission and enjoy your sea adventures!

name: Bliss
description: Bliss is a Third Person Hack & Slash Adventure Game with Open World

name: Now Testing: 407
description: A puzzle-platform game taking place inside of a videogame where you can exploit glitches to solve puzzles and traverse outside of the actual game map.

name: Sudokumaniacs
description: Sin descripción

name: Ante
description: Become counterspatially synchronous: In negative space, stacking blocks is also creating holes.

name: Chaos Battle Universe
description: Build teams from your favorite characters across the Multiverse and let them clash in epic confrontations throughout various stages.

name: Magic Archers
description: Come and repel your enemies with superb archery skills! Use the magic box with its various Skills! Never give up, no matter the circumstances! Come and enjoy！

name: Haru
description: Night falls. Spirits rise. Some are friendly, and some are not. Journey into the Icelandic wilderness as Haru, a young girl searching for her lost sister. Play your harmonica to ward off ghosts looming over the forest. Experience a hauntingly beautiful story of trust, fear, and determination.

name: Frequency: Chernobyl - First Signal
description: An immersive adventure game about the secrets of radio broadcasts. Take a journey to the Exclusion Zone, face the time anomaly, and solve the mystery behind the broadcasts from 1986.

name: Through the Helios
description: Action adventure dungeon crawler where you sling spells and slay monsters, in a bid to retrieve a stolen relic.

name: Card Apocalypse
description: Card Apocalypse is a roguelike card game. The game has carried on the innovation design to the card fighter system, enables the player to implement the game strategy in a very novel way.And the game also includes a large number of cards, treasures and events.

name: Bella: The girl in the Woods
description: A game Inspired by true events that happened to a guy went he went camping alone in the forest and encountered a girl in the middle of the night. Out of curiosity he searched all over the forest and found an abandoned house where he learned the secrets of Bella and the reason behind missing people.

name: Sudden Way
description: This is a fun and unusual platformer with modern pixel art graphics and very simple controls. Take the hero through an unknown and dangerous world full of mysteries and dangerous traps.

name: Chess of Chains
description: A 2D turn-based strategy game. PUSH, PULL, CHAIN, SWING. Check out what's new on the game board!

name: Traceur's Dreamlab VR
description: Traceur's Dreamlab is a place to be for every parkour runner! You can build your own levels, including not only challenging obstacles but also tricky puzzles and share them with the community. Within our leaderboard system you can run against the time of your friends and other online players.

name: Postmaster Legacy
description: Your parents have entrusted you with the family Post Office! Tucked far away from the city and nestled within the rural village of Willowbrook, how will you decide to run it? Get to know the eccentric townsfolk, explore a village full of mysteries and make a name for yourself...it's all up to you!

name: Lost Alone
description: You are an intern headed to a secret military lab. Your plane crashes into a helicopter on arrival and you are the only survivor. Now you must hunt down different items to survive. But it's not so simple.

name: The Magic Elevator
description: The Magic Elevator takes you on a journey into 5 magical worlds created by artist Johan Pruys. The worlds include: Magic, Space, Water, Clouds and Happy New Year.

name: Space Duels
description: 1v1 online multiplayer spaceship duels with realistic physics

name: Gethaut
description: The cyberpunk shooter with horror elements. The plot tells about fight of military corporations and opposition of cars and demons.

name: Farty Bird
description: Take on a procedurally generated series of comedic enemies and fight your friends for the top score in Farty Bird!

name: Difficult Platformer Game
description: A very fun platformer game, this is NoTheOtherMatt's first game.

name: Chinese Game Company Simulator
description: Chinese Game Company Simulator is a party RPG simulator that uses genuine simulation data to reflect the Chinese gaming market as a whole. You'll be dropped into a unique environment in which your every move affects the industry around you. As the underdog, you'll need to fight hard to flip the tables on your competitors dominating the market.

name: A Little Bird
description: The A Little Bird contains 50 different puzzles and beautiful illustrations. Break the puzzle and complete the fairy tale book of the princess through dialogue with important characters!

name: Realms of Eternity
description: Inspired by Thief Series, Dark messiah and Blade of Darkness. Psychics based combat, exotic weapons and mechanics.

name: Count the Dead
description: Sin descripción

name: Entrapment
description: Reboot and Reload! Entrapment is a Multiplayer, Player versus Environment, Survival game where you fight off hordes of robots as a robot! You will need complete tasks alone or with friends to escape the hoard of enemy robots. Until then, survive!

name: Escaping maze
description: This is a first person action shooting game,Players are surrounded by zombies,Players are free to explore the surrounding area,Players can kill zombies or avoid zombie attacks and survive as long as possible.

name: VR Parallel World
description: Are you living your best life? Join this game, where you can recreate your life in another world, with your beloved girl, in any space-time of your choice. You will create a new life for yourself, in any space-time you love.

name: Dreaming on the last light
description: design of four main ending lines to make the game a non-one-time customs clearance product, and at the same time show you the story of the puppet hall through a total of more than 700 CGs, plus interesting brain-burning room levels and collection elements

name: Temple of the Wumpus
description:
Welcome, Pilgrim

You have arrived at the Temple of the Wumpus, a holy shrine said to house the incorporeal body of the divinity known as the Wumpus. Pilgrims come to this massive temple in order to pray in the presence of the Wumpus's incorporeal body.

Explore over 100 rooms filled with hints, lore, and secrets. Kneel in prayer and see if you can find the slow-moving, divine Wumpus.

name: Neverfix Station
description: Frenetic multiplayer couch co-op game about fixing train’s railroad. Get resources, build materials and fix the railroad! Don't spare any time and cooperate with your teammates to repair the railroad before any train arrives.

name: Tout Savoir: CE2
description: Sin descripción

name: Wanderers
description: Embark on a journey through a mysterious alien solar system and uncover it's dark secrets. Fight for survival, build a base, and construct a spaceship. Explore each diverse and unique planet and piece together the mystery.

name: Muscle Power
description: 3D action shooter that protects the world with muscles

name: Demon Engines
description: Create the ultimate weapon with over 2.4 million possible combinations and counting. Engage enemies far with sniper grenade launcher. Get up-close and personal with automatic shotgun with exploding bolts. Near limitless combinations

name: Trapped
description: Broken enough that you can barely hold objects. Can you escape the dungeon with some vague clues and a time limit?

name: World War 2 Craft
description: World War II RTS

name: Seyken: Crystal Kingdom
description: A free indie mmorpg/mana series fangame.

name: Nowhere Else and Beyond
description: A free indie Browser Based MMORPG that has shut down.

name: Warhammer: End Times - Vermintide Karak Azgaraz
description: Explore 3 stunning new adventure maps in this DLC for Vermintide, where you travel outside of Ubersreik's walls to the snowy Karak Azgaraz

name: Yuppy's Adventure
description: A Jump and Run Adventure like many before it, but with a twist. There are/are going to be many new mechanics not present in the classics. Also a Combination with other Genres is in Progress, for example Space Shooter. Stay curious!

name: Rolling Cube
description: Can you help the red cube to sprint toward the end while crowding out another pile of obstacles? By only moving from left to right, the excitement of gameplay can reach beyond your wildest imagination.

name: VR Basketball Hoops
description: Attention basketball fanatics! Test your basketball practice and shot techniques in our Virtual reality basketball game - VR Basketball Hoops, a fun way to play Basketball!

name: Hexer
description: You go around you kill the dungeon, you kill more dungeons you do the events, you fight the boss, you progress to the next level, you repeat 3 times, you win the game.

name: Cataclysms and Catastrophes
description: Four adorable cats come together to form a classic adventuring party in this turn-based RPG. Explore the 2D side-scrolling world with your party members' unique abilities. Choose combat actions and play minigames to attack enemies.

name: Gander National Park
description: Get lost in the vast wilderness of Gander National Park. In this hiking simulator you can explore and unravel the park's mysteries, or just enjoy a relaxing hike. Make friends and help other hikers while earning karma points to determine your hike's ending.

name: Playhear : Square Paper City
description: Play an electronic music album as a trippy video game: a first-person walking simulator set in a surreal world, where the music evolves according to your actions in gravity defying places, mind-blowing labyrinths and Euclidean suburbs.

name: Magicademia
description: Magicademia is a tycoon game in which you can design and manage the magic school of your dreams the way you want. Hire some experienced wizards to teach spell casting to the new, brim-hatted generation. Expand your knowledge and school in order to become world's best magical academy!

name: Shatter Sky
description: Shatter Sky is an upcoming indie flight sim where you get to fly really fast and blow stuff up.

name: Retailer Tycoon
description: Retailer Tycoon is a base building, retail empire game. This game allows you to create any kind of retail shop you can think of. This RTS game allows you to make billions of in game money from your store. Create endless possibilities of stores and create that chain all though Sydney Australia.

name: Phoenix Dust
description: Phoenix Dust is a 3D story-driven Action-RPG set in a fantasy world, Delia. Take on the role of Rion on his journey to rescue his sister. Choose from a plethora of armors, weapons, and consumables to help you in taking on difficult enemies and bosses.

name: Tout Savoir: 5E
description: Sin descripción

name: Rack 2: Furry Science
description: Rack 2 is a bondage-themed adult video game featuring predominately furry / anthropomorphic characters.

name: Tout Savoir: CP
description: Sin descripción

name: Vegas Casino High 5
description: Sin descripción

name: Personal Trainer Men
description: Sin descripción

name: Dinos Reborn
description: Dinos Reborn is an open-world FPP survival game in a sci-fi setting with a mind-blowing storyline and intriguing mechanics, where you can turn from being a hunter to prey in a matter of seconds. Run, sneak, craft and shoot to survive to uncover a great mystery.

name: Oraiah
description: Become the King of your own nation and restore the ancient empire of Oraiah. Claim the imperial throne by submitting your enemies by strength or by shining so much that it will force the other pretenders to the throne to submit to you. What will you do, my Lord?

name: Excidio: The Kaiju Game
description: Take control of giant Kaiju and destroy everything in your path!

name: ReverieTale
description: VR Hack&Slash Game - Slice and dice your enemies with a sword Run up and down the field and use your skills to annihilate the enemies!

name: Apocalypse Survivor
description: Apocalypse Survivor is a challenging first-person shooter (FPS), set after a nuclear war.

name: The Chaser's Voyage
description: Pilot the Chaser through dangerous interstellar terrain and shake off hostile pursuers in this 2D single-player sci-fi adventure. Transport clients from planet to planet in order to pay off your debt to a notorious pirate lord before it's too late!

name: My Funeral Home
description: Start your own funeral home business and whether it is the right fit for you. Build your hearse, transfer the remains, prepare bodies for burial, and make a decent income. With all the work, there’s little room for downtime. Death knows how to keep you busy.

name: The Last Relic
description: Take the role of Ellie, young girl in the quaint town of Haven who is spirited away to a world of magic and whimsy, in this 90s inspired indie RPG. Join a colorful cast of characters while battling through a diverse collection of locales against vicious enemies and devastating obstacles!

name: AIDroneSim
description: AIDroneSim is an FPV drone simulation where you can simulate your own drone. Simply place a BlackBox log file in the game, then fly your own quadcopter in races or free flight on a variety of maps.

name: Bunker Down
description: The world is over. Can you manage to rebuild? The nuclear apocalypse has finally happened leaving you in charge of a bunker. Accept or reject characters from your bunker to assemble the best group in order to rebuild when you finally resurface.

name: The Forgotten Isles
description: The Forgotten Isles is a fast-paced action platformer. Navigate your way past obstacles, boost across treacherous ravines, and advance through multiple worlds.

name: Dots n Lines
description: Dots n Lines (Dots and Boxes) game is a classic and old school game brought you by LightHouse Studio Europe.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog 2 HD
description:
Sonic 2 HD is an unofficial overhaul of SEGA’s franchise classic for the modern world. It is made for fans, by fans, with no financial gain whatsoever.

From the very beginning of the project, Sonic 2 HD has focused on maintaining the feel that has made Sonic the Hedgehog 2 a classic while using new tools to reimagine the original as it could have been were it made today. The game’s art direction reflects this, but Sonic 2 HD has also given equal attention to unseen essential elements in the physics and audio. The result of this is an unprecedented re-interpretation in high definition graphics, music and gameplay of Sonic 2, which continues to set quality standards to this day.

2D artwork is the foundation of Sonic’s retro roots. With this in mind, the goal was to produce a similar shading style to the Japanese original concept artwork and set it in motion with hand-drawn animations. Now, 25 years after Sonic 2’s release, Sonic 2 HD can faithfully represent the original’s cast of characters and environments in a world where technology no longer imposes artistic limitations.

name: Blood of Heroes
